name: These Remains
description:
halloweens2018s. lotta garbage in my head here take a look.

arrowkeys-move
z-attack
x-dash
enter-pause
remappable in options

game saves automatically probably

stuff thats not obvious:
-during a regular dash you're invincible while in motion
-when you get the ability to deal damage while dashing you're invincible the full duration of the animation if you have at least one charge
-more dash charges increases damage dealt by the dash and the wake

thx to https://hankworx.itch.io/ for providing some music and sfx or i woulda been doomed for sure.

had some performance probs with chrome i dunno. maybe its alright.
